message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%. It's a good deal considering the inflation.
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, Alice, but I need to ensure I get a fair share as well. This offer reflects the value of my time and contribution.
Bob, time is money, and it's depreciating fast! I'll meet you in the middle - 55% for me. Let's close this deal before our shares shrink further.
